name: Sweet Stadium - Multiplayer Battle Arena
description:
This new sweet addiction is sure to bring new meaning to a "Food Fight"!

You will droll with delight and battle for a shot at the sweet taste of Victory!

Sweet Stadium is a fun multiplayer brawler that lets you play simultaneously against opponents all over the world. Fight across 5 custom battle arenas, and unlock a banquet of over 24 tasty characters!

Choose from an assortment of mouth-watering Cakes, Candy Bars, Ice-Cream Cones, Gummy Bears and more. Don't worry, we are sure they won't spoil your appetite!

Score by stomping or hitting rivals with tasty objects and reveal their gooey centers. Just avoid getting hit yourself!

Collect cool power ups to help gain the advantage in battle. Win more Candy. Then redeem your candy points for prizes at the Candy Machine!

Features:

- 24 mouth-watering characters!
- 5 beautifully designed, unique levels!
- Realtime Multiplayer, with up to 4 players!
- Quest / In-game Challenges
- Tons of delicious power-ups!
- Climb the realtime Leaderboards!
- Tasty Achievements!
- Play with anyone across all devices!


Well what are you waiting for? Come take a bite.
